00046 float uiHUD::getTimeCount()
00047 {
00048         clock_t end = clock();
00049         float seconds = (float)(end - start) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00050         if (100 - seconds <= 0)
00051         {
00052                 zeroClock = false;
00053         }
00054         return 100 - seconds;
00055 }

00067 int uiHUD::genScore()
00068 {
00069         curScore = ((getTimeCount() * 10) / cball) * 1000;
00070         return curScore;
00071 }

00089 void uiHUD::displayUIHUD(const GLuint & tempImage)
00090 {
00091         int d = 200; //width and height of hud arc
00092         
00093         glPushMatrix();
00094         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00095         glPushMatrix();
00096         glLoadIdentity();
00097         gluOrtho2D(0, width, 0, height);
00098         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00099         glLoadIdentity();
00100         
00101         //gl depth test disabled so hud draws correctly
00102         glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST|GL_LIGHTING); // disable depth test for 2d, lighting for text
00103         glClear(GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00104         glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D); //need for tempImage
00105 
00106         // display images: quad is counterclockwise starting top left, texture coords are top left = 0,0
00107         // this will be the corners with the menu, timer, ball stats, player/score stats
00108         // BALL STATS
00109         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tempImage); 
00110         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00111                 glTexCoord2f(0.5, 0.0);
00112                 glVertex2f(0, d);
00113                 glTexCoord2f(0.5, 0.5);
00114                 glVertex2f(0, 0);
00115                 glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.5);
00116                 glVertex2f(d, 0);
00117                 glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0);
00118                 glVertex2f(d, d);
00119         glEnd();
00120 
00121         //TIMER
00122         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00123                 glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.5);
00124                 glVertex2f(width-d, height);
00125                 glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0);
00126                 glVertex2f(width-d, height-d);
00127                 glTexCoord2f(0.5, 1.0);
00128                 glVertex2f(width, height-d);
00129                 glTexCoord2f(0.5, 0.5);
00130                 glVertex2f(width, height);
00131         glEnd();
00132 
00133         //MENU
00134         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00135                 glTexCoord2f(0.5, 0.5);
00136                 glVertex2f(0, height);
00137                 glTexCoord2f(0.5, 1.0);
00138                 glVertex2f(0, height - d);
00139                 glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0);
00140                 glVertex2f(d, height-d);
00141                 glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.5);
00142                 glVertex2f(d, height);
00143         glEnd();
00144 
00145         //PLAYER/SCORE STATS 
00146         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00147                 glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0);
00148                 glVertex2f(width - d, d);
00149                 glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.5);
00150                 glVertex2f(width-d, 0);
00151                 glTexCoord2f(0.5, 0.5);
00152                 glVertex2f(width, 0);
00153                 glTexCoord2f(0.5, 0.0);
00154                 glVertex2f(width, d);
00155         glEnd();
00156         
00157         //data will need to be converted to string in order to put on screen
00158         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0); //sets active to none
00159         glColor3f(0.498f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
00160         //FIX STARTS
00161         glRasterPos2i(30, 100);// position of balls in play counter
00162         glutBitmapString(GLUT_BITMAP_9_BY_15, (const unsigned char*)std::to_string(getBallCount()).c_str());  //replace with ballsInPlay variable to string **MT Changed to sing getters and sets to be converted to a string
00163         glRasterPos2i(100, 40);// position of balls in play counter
00164         glutBitmapString(GLUT_BITMAP_9_BY_15, (const unsigned char*)std::to_string(getTotalBallCount()).c_str());
00165         glRasterPos2i(width-110, height-30);
00166         glutBitmapString(GLUT_BITMAP_9_BY_15, (const unsigned char*)std::to_string(getTimeCount()).c_str());  //replace with timer variable to string
00167         glRasterPos2i(width-140, 20);
00168         glutBitmapString(GLUT_BITMAP_9_BY_15, (const unsigned char*)std::to_string(getDist()).c_str());  // replace with distFromGoal variable to string & planetsHit variable to string **MT now activly shows how far away from the goal you are
00169         glRasterPos2i(width - 50, 80);
00170         glutBitmapString(GLUT_BITMAP_9_BY_15, (const unsigned char*)std::to_string(hit_Planets).c_str());//MT** Planets hits number
00171         //FIX ENDS
00172         
00173         glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST|GL_LIGHTING);
00174 
00175         // Reset Perspective Projection
00176         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00177         glPopMatrix();
00178         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00179         glPopMatrix();
00180 
00181         
00182 }
00183 
00184 void uiHUD::displayInstruct(const GLuint & tempImage)
00185 {
00186         //finding centre of screen
00187         int wc = width / 2;
00188         int hc = height / 2;
00189         int d = 512/2; // half of width and height of screen
00190 
00191         glPushMatrix();
00192         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00193         glPushMatrix();
00194         glLoadIdentity();
00195         gluOrtho2D(0, width, 0, height);
00196         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00197         glLoadIdentity();
00198 
00199         //gl depth test disabled so hud draws correctly
00200         glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00201         glDisable(GL_LIGHTING);
00202         glClear(GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00203         glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D); //need for tempImage
00204 
00205         // display menu image at screen centre
00206         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, tempImage);
00207         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00208         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0);
00209         glVertex2f(wc - d, hc + d);
00210         glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0);
00211         glVertex2f(wc - d, hc - d);
00212         glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0);
00213         glVertex2f(wc + d, hc - d);
00214         glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0);
00215         glVertex2f(wc + d, hc + d);
00216         glEnd();
00217 
00218         glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00219         glEnable(GL_LIGHTING);
00220 
00221         // Reset Perspective Projection
00222         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00223         glPopMatrix();
00224         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00225         glPopMatrix();
00226 }

00228 void uiHUD::mouseUIHUD(int button, int state, int x, int y)
00229 {
00230         //KM 15/10/2016 click noise - sourced from http://soundbible.com/1705-Click2.html
00231         CEasySound *es;
00232         CSound* clickSound;
00233         es = CEasySound::Instance();
00234         clickSound = es->GetSound(es->Load("sounds/Click2-Sebastian-759472264.wav"));
00235 
00236         if ((button == GLUT_LEFT_BUTTON) && (state == GLUT_DOWN))
00237         {
00238                 if (x <= 200 && x >= 0 && y <= 200 && y >= 0) 
00239                 {
00240                         clickSound->Play();
00241                         gVar.uiMenu = true;
00242                         //pause timer & animation
00243                 }
00244         }
00245 }
